recommended_actions: This restaurant appears relatively safe for gluten allergies
Look for menu items marked as allergen-free
relevant_review_excerpts: [gluten]: ...e DESSERT!!!! The chocolate cake with raspberry sorbet is to die for. Will be coming back over and over again, such a wonderful experience. I can eat gluten but my husband can’t and this is the most delicious gluten free restaurant I’ve ever been to.

[bread]: ...r an early dinner on a Saturday night. Lovely setting and interior. The service was great and the food was amazing. Incredibly delicious and the warm bread, this is always where they win me over. So good. Pleasantly surprised and I can't wait to come back again.
